message.elytratime.no_elytra: You don't have an elytra equipped!
option.elytratime.alert_type.title: Title
tooltip.elytratime.tooltip_format:
The format of the tooltip

§nVariables§r
§l[TIME]§r: The time remaining
§l[%]§r: The percentage durability remaining
tooltip.elytratime.use_same_format: When enabled, the HUD will use the same format as the tooltip
tooltip.elytratime.hud_format:
The format of the HUD

§nVariables§r
§l[TIME]§r: The time remaining
§l[%]§r: The percentage durability remaining
tooltip.elytratime.alert_enabled: Enables / disables the warning when durability is low
tooltip.elytratime.alert_threshold_secon: The number of seconds remaining the elytra has to go under to alert the player
tooltip.elytratime.alert_type: Where the warning should be displayed
tooltip.elytratime.green_color: Color used when durability is above the yellow threshold
tooltip.elytratime.yellow_color: Color used when durability is below the yellow threshold
tooltip.elytratime.red_color: Color used when durability is below the red threshold
tooltip.elytratime.alert_color: Color used for the low durability warning messages
tooltip.elytratime.yellow_threshold: The percentage durability remaining to change the color to yellow
tooltip.elytratime.red_threshold: The percentage durability remaining to change the color to red
tooltip.elytratime.time_report_format:
The format used for the time report in chat

§nVariables§r
§l[TIME]§r: The time remaining
§l[%]§r: The percentage durability remaining
tooltip.elytratime.pad_seconds: Whether to pad seconds with a leading zero (e.g. 05s vs 5s)
tooltip.elytratime.total_seconds_only: Displays the total time in seconds, without converting to minutes
tooltip.elytratime.hud_alignment: The horizontal alignment of the HUD text relative to the X position
tooltip.elytratime.hud_scale: The scale of the HUD display
tooltip.elytratime.hud_x: The horizontal position of the HUD
tooltip.elytratime.hud_y: The vertical position of the HUD
